#import required modules

import pyodbc
import openpyxl
from openpyxl import load_workbook
from openpyxl.utils.dataframe import dataframe_to_rows
from openpyxl.worksheet.table import Table, TableStyleInfo
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import Row, SparkSession
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *

#pull in source parameter values from KEY VAULT

sqlservername = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('DataQualityPOCKeyVault','sqlservername')
sqldbusername = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('DataQualityPOCKeyVault','sqldatabaseusername')
jdbcDatabase = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('DataQualityPOCKeyVault','sqldatabase')
password = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('DataQualityPOCKeyVault','sqldbpassword')

jdbcPort = "1433"

jdbcHostname = "%s.database.windows.net" %(sqlservername)
username = "%s@%s"%(sqldbusername,sqlservername)

jdbcUrl = "jdbc:sqlserver://{0}:{1};database={2}".format(jdbcHostname, jdbcPort, jdbcDatabase)
connectionProperties = {
    "user" : username,
    "password" : password,
    "driver" : "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver"

#pull in target parameter values from synapse pipeline
object_type='sql'

target_object_name='global_superstore'
target_account_name = "etlstoragepocaccount"
target_container_name = "etlstoragepocfilesystem"
target_relative_path = "csv"

source_account_name = "etlstoragepocaccount"
source_container_name = "etlstoragepocfilesystem"
source_relative_path = "csv"
source_object_name='srcsqldbschema.Global_Superstore'

#Get Target DataFrame

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (target_container_name, target_account_name, target_relative_path)

df1 = spark.read.option('header', 'true') \
                .option('delimiter', ',') \
                .csv(adls_path + '/'+target_object_name+'.csv')

#Get Source DataFrame
if object_type=='sql':
  pushdown_query = "(Select * from "+source_object_name+") source_object"
  df = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)

if object_type=='parquet':
  adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (source_container_name, source_account_name, source_relative_path)
  df = spark.read.load(adls_path + '/'+source_object_name+'/', format='parquet')

from datetime import date
current_date = str(date.today())

a=get_test_cases(object_type,target_object_name,jdbcUrl,connectionProperties)

print(a)

#condition checks for Source

#get current date
from datetime import date
current_date = str(date.today())

#getMaximimRunIDfromPipelineSummaryTable for the object
run_id=get_run_id(target_object_name,current_date,jdbcUrl,connectionProperties)


#get test cases
pushdown_query = "(Select Test_Case from [sqldbschema].[Test_Case_Control] where Layer='Ingestion' and Object_Type='"+object_type+"' and Table_name ='"+target_object_name+"') Test_Case_Control"
df_Test_Case = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)

columns_IngestionSummary = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
                      StructField("Check_Type", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Status", StringType(), False)]) 

return_value="1"   

for test_case in df_Test_Case.collect():
    v_test_case=test_case[0]
    test_case_flag=eval(""+v_test_case+" (df ,df1)")
        
    #update IngestionSummary table
    vals_temp_count=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,v_test_case,test_case_flag)]
    df_temp_test_case = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_count, columns_IngestionSummary)

    df_temp_test_case.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Ingestion_Summary", properties=connectionProperties) 

    if test_case_flag!='Success':
        return_value="0" 

columns_PipelineSummary = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
          StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
          StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
          StructField("Layer", StringType(), False),
          StructField("Status", StringType(), False)])

#update PipelineSummary table
if (return_value=="1"):
    vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Ingestion','Success')]
    df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns_PipelineSummary) 
else:
    vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Ingestion','Failed')]
    df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns_PipelineSummary) 

df_temp_pipelinesumm.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Pipeline_Summary", properties=connectionProperties)
